about_the_game:
Enter the epic world of Daughters of the Dragon, a captivating and perilous adventure where you, a simple peasant, are chosen to assume the legendary role of Dragon Rider. You are the first man ever selected for such an honor; no one understands the reason behind this extraordinary exception, and soon, the entire court of the Dragon Queen takes notice of your presence. Your life takes a dramatic turn as you are drawn into a secretive world of power, honor, and magic, surrounded by beautiful and mysterious candidates, each possessing unique ambitions and talents.

Every figure you meet within the Dragon Queen's Castle conceals a web of secrets and motivations, while the ancient, majestic walls of the castle serve as the backdrop for political intrigue and dangerous dynamics. In such a complex and unpredictable environment, you’ll need to navigate strategies and alliances, remaining constantly vigilant. Some court members will try to win you over with seductive promises and their unique skills, while others may reveal themselves as challenges or rivals.

About the characters: Kaela

A stunning voluptuous blonde with cherry lips, one of the other two candidates to become a dragon rider. Since she was born, her family forced her to study and train to become a Raider. She always takes what she wants! Will She want you too?

Yet the castle is far more than a stage for power games—it pulses with an ancient magic, and dragons, legendary creatures symbolizing strength and mystery, watch your every move. Through a choice-based system that changes the course of your adventure, every decision has the power to alter your fate and the fates of those who accompany you. Will you take the path of an honest leader or an intriguing strategist? Each option brings you closer to becoming a true Dragon Rider or uncovering hidden truths and unimaginable dangers.

About the characters: Queen Eveline

Regal, cunning, and fiercely protective, Queen Eveline rules with an iron will and unmatched intellect. Behind her composed demeanor lies a woman burdened by secrets and sacrifices made in the name of the throne. But is her strength enough to shield her kingdom—and her family—from the growing darkness?

Are you ready to seize your destiny and uncover the mystery behind your exceptional calling?

About the characters: Selena Maevia

young woman who serves as a dragon trainer in the castle. As the daughter of the greatest trainer in history, she carries a legacy of excellence and skill. Selena is an adventurer at heart, always seeking the next thrill and challenge. She will be your tutor at the castle, guiding you through the intricacies of dragon training with a firm hand and unyielding determination.

Key Features of the game:

  • Customizable Protagonist: Play as the courageous peasant Raeno or customize your name to immerse yourself even deeper in the role.

  • Choice-Driven Story System: Every decision you make will have consequences and unlock new paths, directly impacting in-game events and situations.

  • High Replayability: Try new options with each playthrough to discover alternate endings and unlock all available achievements!

  • Magic and Drama at Every Turn: Every character and alliance holds surprises, in a setting filled with mysteries and dangers.

  • Game engine: Ren'py

About the characters: Flavia

The guard chief. Her fiery personality and unmatched combat skills make her both a formidable warrior and a fierce ally (But for who...?). Her loyalty is unshakable, but her temper can ignite even the calmest situations. Will you uncover the vulnerable side of this passionate defender?

About the characters: Anai

One of the three candidates to become a dragon rider. Innocent and shy, with short hazel hair and large, sweet green eyes. Her vulnerability and mysterious sadness hint at a past filled with unspoken sorrows. As a fellow candidate, Anai's quiet strength and determination make her a formidable yet enigmatic rival. The subtle conflict between you and Anai will be marked by moments of tension and understanding, as you both navigate the challenges of the selection process.

About the characters: The Vestals of the Dragon

Two of the several vestals of the Dragon. The sisters, yet so different, show a mischievous spirit, often using thier charm to manipulate and seduce those around them. Together, they form a formidable duo, their schemes shaping the fate of those around them. Are they partners—or puppeteers?

About the characters: Princess Smeralda

The kingdom's jewel, Princess Smeralda , the younger sister of the Dragon Queen, radiates grace and beauty, yet her heart is torn between duty and personal freedom. Beneath her poised exterior lies a free spirit, yearning to break free from the constraints of royal expectations. Will you gain her trust—or see through her veil of mystery?

About the characters: The Vestals of the Dragon

Two of the several vestals of the Dragon. The sisters, yet so different, show a mischievous spirit, often using thier charm to manipulate and seduce those around them. Together, they form a formidable duo, their schemes shaping the fate of those around them. Are they partners—or puppeteers?

About the characters: Princess Smeralda

The kingdom's jewel, Princess Smeralda , the younger sister of the Dragon Queen, radiates grace and beauty, yet her heart is torn between duty and personal freedom. Beneath her poised exterior lies a free spirit, yearning to break free from the constraints of royal expectations. Will you gain her trust—or see through her veil of mystery?

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes several characters, who will be involved in many situations intended for adults, sexual activities of various kind.

Main adult themes included:
- Nudity.
- Masturbation.
- Explicit sex.
- Oral sex.
- Anal sex.
- Lesbian sex.
- Casual sex.
- Sexual assault.
- Strong language.
- Voyeurism.

This game is intended for adult people, and includes sensitive content who someone could find offensive. Take note of that before playing.

name: Daughters of the Dragon Demo
short_description: Enter Daughters of the Dragons, where you, a humble peasant, are chosen as the first male Dragon Rider. Navigate a world of intrigue, powerful allies, and ancient magic. Make choices that shape your fate in a court filled with mystery, danger, and dragons. Will you rise to legendary status?
